Age: Role: Feature, Description: The age of the students ranges from 15 to 18 years.
Gender: Role: Feature, Description: Gender of the students.
Ethnicity: Role: Feature, Description: The ethnicity of the students.
ParentalEducation: Role: Feature, Description: The education level of the parents.
StudyTimeWeekly: Role: Feature, Description: Weekly study time in hours.
Absences: Role: Feature, Description: Number of absences during the school year.
Tutoring: Role: Feature, Description: If the student received tutoring.
ParentalSupport: Role: Feature, Description: The level of parental support.
Extracurricular: Role: Feature, Description: Participation in extracurricular activities.
Sports: Role: Feature, Description: Participation in sports.
Music: Role: Feature, Description: Participation in music activities.
Volunteering: Role: Feature, Description: Participation in volunteering.
GPA: Role: Feature, Description: Grade Point Average on a scale from 2.0 to 4.0, influenced by study habits, parental involvement, and extracurricular activities.
GradeClass: Role: Target, Description: Classification of students' grades.
